mapper.insert: INSERT INTO open_data ( deal_amount, build_year, deal_year, road_name, road_name_bonbun, road_name_bunbun, road_name_sigungu_code, road_name_seq, road_name_basement_code, road_name_code, dong, bonbun, bunbun, sigungu_code, eubmyundong_code, land_code, apartment_name, deal_month, deal_day, serial_number, area_for_exclusive_use, jibun, regional_code, floor, cancel_deal_day, gu ) VALUES ( #{dealAmount}, #{buildYear}, #{dealYear}, #{roadName}, #{roadNameBonbun}, #{roadNameBunbun}, #{roadNameSigunguCode}, #{roadNameSeq}, #{roadNameBasementCode}, #{roadNameCode}, #{dong}, #{bonbun}, #{bunbun}, #{sigunguCode}, #{eubmyundongCode}, #{landCode}, #{apartmentName}, #{dealMonth}, #{dealDay}, #{serialNumber}, #{areaForExclusiveUse}, #{jibun}, #{regionalCode}, #{floor}, #{cancelDealDay}, #{gu} )
mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(dong,' ',apartment_name) AS apartmentNameDong, avg(deal_amount) AS dealAmountAge, build_year AS buildYear, gu, dong, Jibun FROM open_data GROUP BY CONCAT(dong,' ',apartment_name) ORDER BY count(*) DESC
